snippet: Austrian tyro Dominic Thiem edged closer to a potential semi-final showdown with world number one Novak Djokovic at the French Open on Wednesday, when he ended Spaniard Marcel Granollers' charmed run in the fourth round....
lead_paragraph: Austrian tyro Dominic Thiem edged closer to a potential semi-final showdown with world number one Novak Djokovic at the French Open on Wednesday, when he ended Spaniard Marcel Granollers' charmed run in the fourth round.

headline.print_headline: Granollers' French Open Luck Runs Out as Thiem Triumphs
headline.main: Granollers' French Open Luck Runs Out as Thiem Triumphs
